title: DEAD GAME LEAGUE OF LEGENDS
body:
So I tried to play a normal game after few weeks and chill out. I went toplane and what I didn't know ... there is STILL Darius with ignite camping a bush in early.

I was like 0/9 because you jsut cannot fight darius with ignite. I still wonder why does not Riot realise these things.

Dead 4ss game.
